text:
Welcome to Azboard, your trusted property management service provider! We offer a comprehensive 
range of solutions to meet all your property needs, including construction services such as foundation 
work, bricklaying, roofing, and flooring. Our plumbing services range from water line installation to drain 
cleaning, while our electrical services cover wiring, lighting, and panel upgrades. We also specialize in 
interior and exterior painting, carpentry for custom woodwork and repairs, flooring installation, 
aluminum and glass fitting, and marble fitting services. Additionally, we provide HVAC installation and 
repair, appliance installation, general handyman services, and landscaping and gardening. 
Our platform also features an augmented reality (AR) tool that allows users to customize room designs 
by uploading images and arranging furniture virtually. 
We offer three tailored property management packages: 
Premium: Includes all weekly base plans, deep cleaning (inside and outsi

de), window and door cleaning, 
garden maintenance, interior maintenance, and security checks – $90 
Basic: Covers regular cleaning, outside cleaning, outside floors, waste management, basic repairs, and 
utility management – $80 
Pro: Includes all premium plans along with full property management – $95 
Customers can easily pay via PayPal, and our team consists of highly trained, certified, and trustworthy 
professionals. With over 20 successful projects completed and exceptional customer feedback, we 
ensure top-notch service and satisfaction.
